DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine SKI-606 ( Bosutinib ) effective treatment advance metastatic breast cancer . Patients must current Stage IIIB , IIIC IV breast cancer progress 1 3 prior chemotherapy regimen .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating SKI-606 ( Bosutinib ) In Subjects With Breast Cancer
DOC.criteria: Stage IIIB , IIIC IV breast cancer curable available therapy . Patients must progress 1 3 prior chemotherapy regimen . Life expectancy least 16 week . Ability swallow whole capsule . Use requirement bisphosphonates within 8 week prior screen . Any cancer within 5 year screen , except basal cell carcinoma cervical carcinoma situ Uncontrolled cardiac disease include congestive heart failure , angina , heart attack , etc . Recent ongoing significant gastrointestinal disorder
